verses.content: Chun, Abram chu kum sawm- kuo pakuo mi a niin LALPA chu Abram kuomah a hung inlâr a, a kuomah, “Kei Pathien Iengkim- thawthei ka nih, ka hmaah um la, ṭha famkimin um rawh.
Chuongchun, nang le ei kârah thu thlung ka ta, nasatakin sukpung ka ti che,” a tih a.
Chun, Abram chu a bawkkhup tah a; chun, Pathienin ama chu a biek a,
“Ngai ta, kei chun ka thuthlung chu i kuomah a nih ka thlung chu: chuongchun, chi tum tum, chi tamtak thlatu ni tâng i tih.
I hming khawm Abram ni ta naw nih a, i hming chu Abraham ni ta lem a tih, chi tamtak thlatu dingin ka siem ta che hi.
Nasatakin chi inthlatir ka ti cheh a, nangmaa chun chi ti khawp hiel dâm siem ka ta, nangmaa inthawkin lalhai hung suok bawk an tih.
Chun, kei le nang le i hnunga i thlahai an thla sâwng peihai chen inkârah kumkhaw thuthlung dingin ka thuthlung hi sukdet ka tih, i ta ding le i hnunga i thlahai ta dinga Pathien ka nina dingin.
Chun, i kuoma le i hnunga i thlahai kuoma chun, i khuolchâmna ram, Kanaan ram po po hi, kum- khaw ro dingin ka pêk ding cheu a nih; chun kei hi an Pathien nîng ka tih,” a tih a.
Chun, Pathien bawkin Abraham kuoma chun, “Chun, nang chun chu, ka thuthlung hi i zâwm ding a nih; nang le i hnunga i thlahai an thla nâwksâwng pei chen khawmin in zâwm ding a nih.
Hi hi kei le nang le i hnunga i thlahai kâra ka thuthlung i zâwm ding chu a nih: nangni laia pasal taphawt chu ser tan ding a nih.
Chuongchun, in ser hmawr vuna chun sertanin in um ding a nih; chu chu nang le ei inkâra thuthlung inchikna chu nîng a tih.
Nangni laia ni riet mi chu in thla sâwng peihai chen khawmin, i thla ni kher lo, i ina pieng amani khawm, mikhuol kuoma tangka suma inchâwk amani khawm, pasal taphawt chu ser tan ding a nih.
I ina pieng le i tangka suma i închâwk khawm ser tan ngei ding a nih: chuongchun, ka thuthlung chu kumkhaw thuthlung dingin in tisaa chun um tâng a tih.
Chun, pasal ser tan lo, a ser hmawr vun tisaa sertana um naw chu, chu ngei chu a chipui laia sukbohmang nîng a ta: ama chun ka thuthlung chu a bawsiet a nih,” a ti nâwk a.
Chun, Pathien bawkin Abra- ham kuomah, “I nuhmei Sarai chu a hmingah Sarai ti ta naw ti nih a, a hming chu Sara ti ni ta lem a tih.

Ama chu mal sâwm ka ta, chu bâka khawm amaa inthawk naupasal pêng ka ti che: anih, ama chu mal sâwm ka ta, chi tum tum thlatunu ni tâng a tih, hnam tum tum lalhai amaa inthawk chun la hung suok an tih,” a ti nâwk a.
Chuongchun, Abraham chu a bawkkhup a, ân nui a, a lungrilin, “Kum za mi hin nau a nei ding am a nih? Sara kum sawmkuo mi chun nau a nei ding am a nih?” a ta.
Chun, Abraham bawk chun Pathien kuomah, “Ismael hi i hmaah um thei sienla aw!” a tih a.

Pathien chun, “Ni lo e, i nuhmei Sarain naupasal neipêk lem a ti che: a hmingah Isak i sak ding a nih: chun ka thuthlung chu ama hnunga a thlahai ta dinga kumkhaw thuthlung dingin a kuoma chun sukdet ka tih.

Ismael chungthu khawm hi ka ngaipêk che a nih: ngai ta, ama chu mal ka sâwm tah a, chi tamtak inthlatir ka ta, nasatakin sukpung bawk ka tih; ama chun lal sâwmpahni thlâng a ta, ama chu chi ropuitakah la siem ka tih.
Ka thuthlung ruok chu, Sarain kum nâwk hieng ang huna a neipêk ding che, Isak chungah sukdet lem ka tih,” a tih a.
A kuoma thu a hril zo chun Pathien chun Abraham chu a kai san tah a.

Chun, Abraham chun a naupa Ismael le a ina pieng po po le, a tangka suma a închâwk po pohai le Abraham sûnghai laia mi pasal taphawt chu a ṭhuoi a, Pathienin a kuoma a hril ta ang ngeiin, chu ni ngei chun an ser hmawr vun tisa chu a tanpêk tâwl a.
Abraham chu a ser hmawr vun tisa an tan lai chun kum sawmkuo pakuo mi a nih.
Chun, a naupa Ismael chu a ser hmawr vun an tan lai chun kum sâwmpathum mi a nih.
Chu ni ngei chun Abraham le a naupa Ismael chu sertan an lo ni tah.
A sûnghai laia pasal po po, a ina pienghai le ram dang mi tangka suma a în châwkhai khawm chu, ama ruol chun an ser tan a ni ta vawng a.
